Name: GEHENA
About the game: GEHENA is a single player first person horror game. After his grandmother Osiros dies, Ernoy goes to the town of Zera to sell his grandmother's house. His grandmother was a beloved boarding school teacher, but rumors spread in the village that he was now a wizard. Children and their families hated her. So what was the reason? Ernoy, who finds himself in the event with many clues, has to make a choice.Come to solve the big mystery and help Ernoy in his choice if you dare. FEATURES Carefully explore your surroundings to find objects Follow the story with notes and dialogues Alternate ending WARNING Watch out for jumpscares and sudden noises. Attention to occasional light bursts for epilepsy patients.
